ideas.title: Relocation Helper App - Full Platform
ideas.description: Multi-platform app (iOS, Android, web) to help Americans relocate abroad. Visa assistance, moving companies, pet relocation, community insights. Start with France/Netherlands focus.

ideas.title: Photography YouTube Channel
ideas.description: Leverage Leica M11-P, Nikon Z8, and Nikon ZR. Share photography journey, techniques, gear reviews. Could tie into Europe relocation content.

ideas.title: Automated Earnings Digest (Paid Version)
ideas.description: Build Streamlit app: enter ticker â†’ auto-fetch transcript â†’ AI summary in 30 seconds. Cost: $5-10/month. Only build if manual version proves valuable.

ideas.title: Earnings Digest - Micro-SaaS
ideas.description: If personal tool works well, productize it. Charge $5-10/month (undercut Seeking Alpha's $20/month). Target: individual investors, finance students.

ideas.title: Europe Relocation Blog/Content Series
ideas.description: Document your own relocation journey to France/Netherlands. Visa process, housing, logistics. Content marketing for future Relocation Helper app.

ideas.title: Food & Photography Fusion Project
ideas.description: Combine love of food with photography skills. Food blog? Instagram? Restaurant reviews in Europe? Revenue via affiliate/sponsorships.

progress.title: Earnings Digest - Free Manual Workflow
progress.description: Testing concept: Manually fetch earnings transcripts from SEC Edgar, summarize with Claude Pro. Goal: 5-10 test runs this week. Compare to Seeking Alpha quality.

progress.title: Relocation Helper - Landing Page
progress.description: Build simple landing page to validate concept. Email capture, value proposition. Use Framer or Next.js. Target launch: Week 2-3.

progress.title: Business Ideas Analysis & Prioritization
progress.description: Evaluate investment app, relocation helper, and website needs. Assess feasibility, costs, ROI. Create strategic roadmap.

progress.title: Learn OpenClaw & Vibe Coding Workflow
progress.description: Master OpenClaw tools, skills, agents. Understand how to build without coding. Practice with real projects.

done.title: OpenClaw Setup & Configuration
done.description: Installed OpenClaw, set up workspace, configured initial settings. Gateway running successfully.

done.title: Daily Morning Brief - Automated
done.description: Set up cron job for 8 AM PST daily. Includes: creative business idea, suggested tasks, weather, inspiration. First brief tomorrow!

done.title: Visual Kanban Dashboard
done.description: Built custom kanban board with drag-and-drop, dark mode, local storage, export/import. Pure HTML/CSS/JS. Content-ready!

done.title: Earnings Digest Workflow Guide
done.description: Created EARNINGS-DIGEST-FREE.md with step-by-step manual workflow. Includes SEC Edgar sources, Claude prompts, text replacement setup.

done.title: Business Ideas Documentation
done.description: Analyzed investment app (on hold - too expensive), relocation helper (high priority), earnings tool (building now). Created IDEAS.md and PROJECT-EARNINGS-DIGEST.md.

done.title: Memory System Initialized
